document_data.name: Spitting Cockatrice
document_data.mainbody: The '''Spitting Cockatrice''' was an [[inn]] found just outside the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located in between [[Mulsantirâ€™s Gate]] and the [[West Gate (Westgate)|West Gate]].
document_data.Activities: The Spitting Cockatrice was a fine inn favored by merchants. The food was average but the extravagant decor, excellent selection of wines, and ample security made up for this. All of these things came with a price as the inn was quite expensive.
